summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene refer to the same compound, 1,3-butadiene, which is a known environmental contaminant and chemical carcinogen. The text discusses the formation and delivery of 1,3-butadiene in cigarette smoke, highlighting its relevance as a metabolically activated substance that poses health risks. The terms are used interchangeably, indicating a direct relationship as they represent the same chemical entity.
